author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Chris Moyles' weight loss secret after losing five stone and transforming his life
text:
Chris Moyles' weight loss secret after losing five stone and transforming his life The former Radio 1 DJ looked unrecognisable this week Share   
Chris Moyles has left the nation stunned by his incredible weight loss after fighting a public battle with the bulge. 
Previously blaming his job for his unhealthy lifestyle, Chris - who dubbed it the 'fat breakfast DJ stage' - had learned to strike a balance, after making the decision to ditch junk food and take up running to stay fit. Chris Moyles has credited his weight loss to running and ditching junk food (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Speaking about his weight loss in 2014, he admitted his entire outlook has changed and he can't believe his previous attitude. 
He told The Sun : "I don’t know what I used to think when I looked in the mirror when I was at my worst. He has totally transformed his image (Photo: PA) 
“Now if I go out on a Friday or Saturday and ave a few beers, I can see that I’m bloating in the mirror on Sunday." 
All his effort clearly seems to be paying off, and the star looked unrecognisable at the opening of pal Jamie Oliver's restaurant on Thursday night. He looked unrecognisable at the event this week (Photo: FameFlynet) 
He proved he's half the man he was, appearing happy and healthy as he posed for snaps outside Piccadilly-based Barbeco. 
The breakfast DJ showed of his slimline silhouette in a fitted white t-shirt, suit jacket and skinny jeans, which he paired with black and white converse trainers. 
The was no hint of a double chin as his chiseled jawline was peppered with grey stubble. Like us on Facebook
